subject: Hockey, Ice
Prudential Center (Newark)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: By the third period, the pockets of empty seats at the Devils’ new Prudential Center had swelled to gaping voids as the Rangers kept the Devils from feeling at home in their still-new building.
snippet: By the third period, the pockets of empty seats at the Devils’ new Prudential Center had swelled to gaping voids as the Rangers kept the Devils from feeling at home in their still-new building.
